attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood for his NHS charity work
attributes.additional_details: The Government have the power to recognise the efforts of this hero for his efforts and they should help to recognise this extraordinary gentleman and hero of the past and the hour.
attributes.background: Encourage the Queen as part of his 100th birthday as a war veteran and an inspiration to us all not only to give him a congratulatory card but a knighthood for his efforts in raising money for the NHS.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
